Vantage is a cloud cost transparency platform currently supporting AWS. Securely link your AWS account in a click of a button and we'll automatically show you where your costs are coming from and how they're trending.

Ennerate - Automated business valuations for 'Main Street' companies

Ennerate (YC W21) does business valuations for small and medium sized traditional businesses (plumbers, manufacturing, etc.) for 5x faster and 10x cheaper than existing services. Users upload financials, take a survey, and our models generate the valuation.
